entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
